summary: The customer was inquiring about payments and streaming services with Contoso Wireless. The agent informed the customer that they accept most major credit cards and PayPal for payment and also have a subscription plan available for their product streaming service. The Plus plan offers access to premium content, exclusive discounts, virtual events, and more for $9.99 per month. The customer decided to go with the Plus plan and the agent provided instructions on how to sign up on the website.
